TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UpdateCheckInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示透過對 的呼叫而取得的詳細更新資訊。

span.span: Represents detailed update information obtained through a call to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 與，您可以決定是否要根據最新版本的相關資訊的 ClickOnce 應用程式升級。With , you can decide whether to upgrade your ClickOnce application based on information about the newest version. 會傳回布林值，指出是否有新的更新完全。 will return a Boolean value indicating whether there is a new update at all. 屬性可提供最新版本，版本號碼而提供使用者應該已安裝的最早版本。The property provides the version number of the new version, while provides the earliest version that the user should have installed. 表示是否需要使用者的最新可用的更新。 expresses whether the latest available update is required of the user. 最後，表示更新的總大小。Finally, expresses the total size of the update. > [!NOTE] > Visual Studio 會加入``唯有檢查更新，因此您可能需要檢查是否已設定的應用程式資訊清單的項目**應用程式應該檢查更新檔**或指定更新 URL 中的**更新位置**中[應用程式更新對話方塊](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8eca8743-8e68-4d04-bfd5-4dc0a9b2934f)。Visual Studio adds the `` element to the manifest only if the application is set to check for updates, so you either have to check **The application should check for updates** or specify an update URL in **Update location** in the [Application Updates Dialog Box](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8eca8743-8e68-4d04-bfd5-4dc0a9b2934f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用來判斷是否有新的應用程式更新，以及來判斷是否要求使用者安裝更新。The following code example uses to determine if there is a new application update, and to determine whether to ask the user to install the update. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#6)]

public: property Version ^ AvailableVersion { Version ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得最新未安裝版本的版本號碼。

span.span: Gets the version number of the latest uninstalled version.

value.span: ，表示最新版本的主要、次要、組建 (Build) 和修訂號碼。

span.span: The expressing the major and minor build and revision numbers of the latest version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用來決定是否要安裝更新，根據更新的嚴重性。You can use to decide whether to install the update based on the severity of the update. 例如，如果只有或版本屬性已經變更，您的應用程式可能不需要更新直到或屬性變更。For example, if only the or version properties have changed, your application may not need to update until either the or properties change.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsUpdateRequired { get; }
.property instance bool IsUpdateRequired
Public ReadOnly Property IsUpdateRequired As Boolean
public: property bool IsUpdateRequired { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，其指出是否必須安裝更新。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the update must be installed.

value.span: 如果需要更新則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the update is required; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您將更新部署 ClickOnce 應用程式時，您可以將它標示為必要的更新，應該立即升級您的應用程式發出訊號。When you deploy an update to your ClickOnce application, you can mark it as a required update, signaling to your application that it should upgrade immediately. 您要標記的應用程式，如果最新版本包含重要的更新，或者它是與檔案格式或先前的版本所使用的後端資料來源不相容。You want to mark the application if the latest version contains a critical update, or if it is incompatible with file formats or back-end data sources used by the former version. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用來判斷是否要詢問使用者安裝更新，或不用提示直接安裝它。The following code example uses to determine whether to ask the user to install the update, or to install it without prompting. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#6)]

summary.span: 取得使用者已經安裝在電腦上的最小版本。

span.span: Gets the minimum version that the user must have installed on the computer.

value.span: ，表示使用者必須安裝的最小版本。

span.span: A expressing the least version that the user must install.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式可以遺漏必要的更新，當使用者的特殊指派或離開電腦週數或月。Applications can miss required updates when the user takes on a special assignment or is away from the computer for weeks or months. 使用Use 若要判斷使用者未升級應用程式在一段時間，以及一或多個遺失必要的更新。 to determine if the user has not upgraded the application in a while, and has missed one or more required updates. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何顯示屬性沒有必要的更新可用時的使用者。The following code example demonstrates displaying the property to the user when there is a required update available. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#6)]

exception.span: 沒有需要安裝的新版本。

span.span: There is no new version available to install.
